stories.text:
Few years back, a few of us got together to develop original content and methodologies so as to make Chinese learning fun and interesting. We saw that current materials and pedagogy tend to be dull and irrelevant. We focus on inspiring kids with interesting content, getting them to draw, and creating their own stories.

We now have our own books [1], published books written and drawn by young children, an art exhibition for kids [2], and now a musical!

We have kids from around the world performing including Singapore, Malaysia, Indonesia, the Philippines, and Ukraine. We use Zoom seminar. It got really really complex [3]!

I invite you to join us this afternoon at 4pm with your kids. It's free! [4]

Here's a trailer [5].

AMA!

(edit: formatting)
